name: 17alpha-Hydroxypregnenolone,NADPH---hemoprotein reductase:oxygen oxidoreductase (17alpha-hydroxylating, acetate-releasing)
definition: 17alpha-Hydroxypregnenolone + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + Oxygen <=> Dehydroepiandrosterone + Acetate + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + H2O
